channel.title: JavaFx on www.rolfje.com
channel.description: Recent content in JavaFx on www.rolfje.com

item.title: J-Fall 2008
item.description:
Last wednesday I was at J-Fall 2008, a fairly large event for Java programmers in the Netherlands. This event is organized by NLJUG. You can read some of my notes on the different sessions in my public evernote.

Here's a one-minute impression of what J-Fall looked like this year:

[youtube=http://nl.youtube.com/watch?v=Fy42_eX_QkA]
